fuzzing_params.Constraints: 5 <= word.length <= 250. word consists only of lowercase English letters. 0 <= k <= word.length - 5

problem_info.title: 3305. Count of Substrings Containing Every Vowel and K Consonants I
test_examples: Example 1: Input: word =  aeioqq , k = 1 Output: 0 Explanation: There is no substring with every vowel.

Example 2: Input: word =  aeiou , k = 0 Output: 1 Explanation: The only substring with every vowel and zero consonants is word[0..4], which is  aeiou . Example 3: Input: word =  ieaouqqieaouqq , k = 1 Output: 3 Explanation: The substrings with every vowel and one consonant are: word[0..5], which is  ieaouq . word[6..11], which is  qieaou . word[7..12], which is  ieaouq .
